channel.title: NPC's Not Moving
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape,
When I play my server and attack an NPC, he will stand there and face you. If your next to him he will attack, but if your away he will just look at your direction. How do I get him to follow you, without nocliping or walking across the map, to get the the player that attacked him and fight back?
-Rich Dude99

item.title: NPC's Not Moving
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

I know, but that makes the walk around. When I attack he still just stands there and faces me, and only attacks if I next to him. How do I make him follow me. (Not too far; without noclipping).

-Rich Dude99

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's Not Moving
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Xcoord2 = xcoord + 1
Ycoord2 = ycoord + 1
Xcoord3 = xcoord - 1
Ycoord3 = ycoord - 1

Take this for example.

spawn = 0	xcoord	ycoord	height	xcoord2	ycoord2	xcoord3	ycoord3	1	Name

Say your X-coordinate was 3000 and your Y-coordinate was 2000, like so

spawn = 0	3000	2000	height	xcoord2	ycoord2	xcoord3	ycoord3	1	Name

Your second X-coordinate would be 3001.

spawn = 0	3000	2000	height	3001	ycoord2	xcoord3	ycoord3	1	Name

And your second Y-coordinate would be 2001.

spawn = 0	3000	2000	height	3001	2001	xcoord3	ycoord3	1	Name

Now your third X-coordinate would be 2999

spawn = 0	3000	2000	height	3001	2001	2999	ycoord3	1	Name

And your third Y-coordinate would be 1999.

spawn = 0	3000	2000	height	3001	2001	2999	1999	1	Name

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's Not Moving
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

I know, I allowed him to walk futher. But the NPC still stays there.

Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's Not Moving
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

in your autospawn.cfg the npc is only aloud to walk to the area he is located.
